This issue happened with BIRT 2.2 build

In 2.2.1, it shows following exception when preview, reassign to model to check if the join condition property is lost when extend a cube from library:

The join condition for between facttable and dimension "product1" is missing. ( 2 time(s) )

Issues about the name management when generating document are fixed in Model part.
However the design file or library has some logic errors so that preview in 'html' or simple preview failed both.
Update the design file and preview is ok. However, 'web viewer' still failed with DataException. Assign DTE to investigate.

In Run mode and Frameset mode, Model actually pass to DtE different CubeHandle definitions.

In Run mode, the DimensionHandle "product" in CubeHandle has only one hierarchy. This is correct for currently we only support one hierarchy per dimension.

In Frameset mode, the same DimensionHandle however contains two hierarchies. DtE uses the wrong hierarchy to populate the cube. This is the source of problem.

As we have all agreed that we only support single hierarchy dimension, the bug is reassigned to model team for further investigation.

Created an attachment (id=75637)
corrected design file
Fixed. 'web viewer' will succeed using corrected design file.

traces.message: The join condition for between facttable and dimension "product1" is missing.
